2 Auckland Council Park Extents

-
Webmap
Download
ArcGIS REST Feature Service
API
OBJECTID Site Description - - - - there is a field (AssetGroup) that has the following values: Park;Holiday;Stormwater;Regional;Active Cemetery;Owned NotMaint. This allows the extraction of regional parks but is not fine enough detail as per metadata: The boundaries drawn in this dataset are NOT legal boundaries; rather these 4 boundaries represent the areas or sites that Auckland Council maintains through its full facility contractors. Also this dataset DOES NOT represent the legal status of the land i.e. whether the land is gazetted under the Reserve Act subject under the Local Government Act or other statutory provisions. The polygons represent the maintenance extent on the land. Can this data be made more descriptive else is there a dataset that can be made availale that list local government parks and reserves?
